issues.message: No explicit memory limit set in wp-config.php
issues.recommendation: Add define('WP_MEMORY_LIMIT', '256M'); to wp-config.php if experiencing memory issues

issues.message: No explicit memory limit set in wp-config.php
issues.recommendation: Add define('WP_MEMORY_LIMIT', '256M'); to wp-config.php if experiencing memory issues

recommendations: ℹ️  MEDIUM: 1 medium-priority issue(s) can be addressed when convenient
